name: The Floor is Lava, Literally!
description:
Filemon, an ambitious but adventurous man overhears people gossiping about hidden treasures inside the Mayon volcano. Curious, the man ventures inside the volcano. Alas the legends are true, the volcano is full of treasure, but lava is quickly rising. Filemon has no choice but to keep jumping and collect treasures on the way up to fulfill his dreams.

Hand-drawned, level designed and audio by my teammate, Salvador.

This is my first ever unity 5 made game years ago as a beginner.
